summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Tracts 16, 17, 18, 19 and 20, Gilson's Ballard Acre Tracts, except the west 125' thereof, and except the south 75' of Tract 16, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-413 and 17-304, respectively.
